item.title: With Moves on West Bank and Gaza City, Israel Defies Global Outcry

item.title: Israel Approves Settlements, a Blow to Faded Hopes for a Palestinian State

item.title: Gazans Fear Looming Israeli Operation
item.description: Israel’s plan to invade Gaza City, the most populous city in the northern Gaza Strip, has forced many families to consider uprooting themselves.
